DOC.brief_summary: The purpose clinical research study assess bioequivalence atazanavir administer single 300 mg capsule relative two atazanavir 150 mg capsule healthy subject .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female subject age 18 50 year old body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/mÂ² Prior enrollment , subject must physical laboratory test finding within normal limit , woman childbearing potential ( WOCBP ) must negative pregnancy test .
